dn16:1.1.5: ucchecchāmi → ucchejjāmi (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed); ucchijjāmi (mr) | anayabyasanaṃ āpādessāmī”ti → āpādessāmi vajjīti (bj); āpādessāmi vajjinti (sya-all, km)
dn16:1.4.12: garuṃ karonti → garukaronti (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn16:1.5.8: Akaraṇīyāva → akaraṇīyā ca (bj, sya-all, km, mr)
dn16:1.16.7: te → kiṃ nu (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
dn16:1.16.10: pana te → kiṃ pana (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
dn16:1.17.6: Tassa evamassa → na passeyya tassa evamassa (sya-all, km)
dn16:1.21.1: sabbasanthariṃ → sabbasantharitaṃ santhataṃ (sya-all, km); sabbasanthariṃ santhataṃ (mr)
dn16:1.26.2: sahasseva → sahassasahasseva (bj udānaṭṭhakathā); sahassasseva (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr); sahassaseva (ṭīkāyaṃ pāṭhantaraṃ)
dn16:1.27.5: kho → ko nu kho (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr) | māpentī”ti → māpeti (si); māpetīti (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
dn16:1.34.5: Kullañhi jano bandhati → kullaṃ hi jano pabandhati (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr); kullaṃ jano ca bandhati (sya-all, km)
dn16:2.7.14: Sādhikā navuti → chādhikā navuti (sya-all); nādhikā navuti (km)
dn16:2.8.2: Tasmiṃyeva → tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kho (sya-all, km); tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ce (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn16:2.16.6: evamahaṃ taṃ → evaṃ mahantaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); evaṃpi mahantaṃ (sya-all, km)
dn16:2.16.8: jitamha → jitamhā (bahūsu) | vata bho ambakāya, jitamha vata bho ambakāyā”ti → (?)
dn16:2.25.11: veṭhamissakena → vekkhamissakena (bj); veḷumissakena (sya-all, km); veghamissakena (pts-vp-pli1ed); vekhamissakena (mr)
dn16:3.10.2: salomahaṃso → lomahaṃso (sya-all, km); lomahaṃsano (pts-vp-pli1ed) | devadundubhiyo → devadundabhiyo (sya-all); devadudrabhiyo (mr)
dn16:3.48.1: paṭikacceva → paṭigacceva (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | etaṃ → evaṃ (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn16:3.51.8: satthā → ito paraṃ sya-all potthakesu evampi pāṭho dissati
dn16:4.8.6: osaranti → otaranti (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | osāriyamānāni → otāriyamānāni (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn16:4.27.13: apisu → apissu (bj); api hi (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn16:4.29.1: aṭṭha vā sakaṭasatāni nava vā sakaṭasatāni → nava vā sakaṭasatāni dasa vā sakaṭasatāni (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn16:4.37.2: hataccikaṃ viya → vītaccikaṃ viya (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); hatacchikaṃ viya (sya-all)
dn16:4.41.5: Nhatvā ca pivitvā cudatāri satthā → nhātvā ca pivitvā cudakāni sutvā (sya-all); nahatvā pitvā cudatāri satthā (pts-vp-pli1ed); pivitvā ca uttari (mr)
dn16:4.42.8: samasamaphalā → samaphalā (bj); samā samaphalā (mr) | samavipākā → samasamavipākā (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn16:5.3.9: apaciyati → idaṃ padaṃ bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed potthakesu na
dn16:5.6.2: chinnapātaṃ papatanti → chinnaṃpādaṃ viya papatanti (sya-all); chinnapātaṃ viyapapatanti (km); chinnapapātaṃ papatanti (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn16:5.7.1: vassaṃvuṭṭhā → vassaṃ vutthā (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn16:5.10.3: ghaṭatha anuyuñjatha → sadatthamanuyujjatha (bj); sadatthe anuyuñjatha (sya-all, km); sadattham anuyuñjatha (pts-vp-pli1ed); sāratthe anuyuñjatha (mr) | sāratthe → sadatthe (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn16:6.11.7: bhante, āyasmā anuruddho devatā manasi karotī”ti → bhante anuruddha devatā manasi karoti (bj); bhante anuruddha devatā manasikarontīti (sya-all, km, mr)
dn16:6.23.6: dveva dussāni na ḍayhiṃsu → dveva dussāni ḍayhiṃsu (si, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn16:6.28.15: Taṃ vandatha → taṃ taṃ vandatha (sya-all, km)
